DOC.detailed_description: Primary Effectiveness Endpoint : A clinically significant reduction GERD symptom , specifically `` Troublesome '' regurgitation without heartburn assess Reflux Disease Questionnaire ( RDQ ) . Troublesome symptom occur minimum 2 day week least moderate severity . Secondary Effectiveness Endpoint : The normalization esophageal acid exposure 6 month clinically significant reduction PPI usage 12 month .
